at.qe.timeguess.services

Class AuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.timeguess.services.AuthenticationService

  • @Component
public class AuthenticationService
extends Object
    Class that provides all methods needed for creating and validating JWT tokens.

      • generateToken

        public String generateToken(User user,
                            Long expiration)
        Generated the jwt token for the specified user with the specified expiration time puts the role of the user into the token and it's username as subject. This is done so that it can be checked with the token if a user is allowed to perform a specific action depending on his role and username.
        Parameters:
        user - user that generates token
        expiration - date when token expires
        Returns:
        JWT Token String

      • generateTokenWithFixedExpiration

        public String generateTokenWithFixedExpiration(User user)

      • validateToken

        public boolean validateToken(String token,
                             User user)
        Validates a JWT token. It checks if the token subject matches with the given user and checks if the token is still valid and not expired.
        Parameters:
        token - to validate
        user - to check token for
        Returns:
        if token is valid

      • setUserAuthentication

        public void setUserAuthentication(User user)
